the Republic of moneys required for the services of the
Republic during the financial year ending 31st December,
1994, not exceeding in the aggregate six hundred and
eighty-six billion, eight hundred and five million, seven
hundred and fifty-seven thousand, one hundred and
nineteen kwacha.
